1. One afternoon  
2. a young girl named Lily discovered a needle in her room.  
3. She understood that playing with it was challenging  
4. due to its sharpness.  
5. Lily wished to give the needle to her mother  
6. so that she could sew a button onto her shirt.  
7. Lily approached her mom  
8. and expressed,  
9. "Mom,  
10. I found this needle.  
11. Can you use it with me  
12. to sew my shirt?"  
13. Her mother beamed  
14. and replied,  
15. "Certainly,  
16. Lily,  
17. we can use the needle together  
18. and mend your shirt."  
19.   
20. Together,  
21. they utilized the needle  
22. and sewed the button onto Lily's shirt.  
23. It was easy for them  
24. since they were collaborating  
25. and assisting one another.  
26. Once they were done,  
27. Lily expressed her gratitude to her mom for using the needle  
28. and repairing her shirt.  
29. Both felt joyful  
30. because they had collaborated  
31. and helped each other.
